trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SEQ_00<tab>Sentei needs help catching a predator.
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_TODO_00<tab>Place the iron leg traps in the designated locations.
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_000<tab>You there, traveler! If you have the time, I would appreciate your help.
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_001<tab>I was rooting around the other day and came across these iron leg traps.
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_002<tab>I would love to make use of them and go hunting, but I know it would only aggravate an old injury of mine. Would you mind setting them up on my behalf?
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_003<tab>I have marked the locations where I want them placed on this map. Make sure you do not accidentally trap your own leg when you are setting them!
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_004<tab>You will find the locations I want the traps placed on that map. Make sure you do not accidentally catch your own leg when you are setting them!
TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_010<tab>I take it you are finished? My thanks.

TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_011<tab>In the old days I used to be quite handy with an axe. I could hunt all kinds of wild beasts without relying on silly traps. I even did my part in resisting the Empire when they invaded.

TEXT_STMBDZ403_02726_SENTEI_000_012<tab>However, a shot to my leg put an end to that. Every now and then the pain will flare up, and I am paralyzed until it abates. Do not worry, I will check the traps once I am able.
